name: CSC SERVICEWORKS
description: Provides laundry solutions, air vending services, and ongoing service/management support
sampleDescriptions: Advocate with HUD to issue guidance to HUD-assisted and multi-family properties on the importance of doing laundry to fight and mitigate the spread of COVID-19.
Advocate with HUD to issue guidance to HUD-assisted and multi-family properties on the importance of doing laundry to fight and mitigate the spread of COVID-19.
Monitor and discuss designation of essential services as it relates to laundry services in response to COVID-19 health crisis
Monitor financial and tax issues stemming from COVID-19 pandemic including the main street lending program, and the paycheck protection program.
Monitor financial and tax issues stemming from the COVID-19 pandemic, including the Main Street Lending Program, the Paycheck Protection Program, and passage of H.R. 6800, the Heroes Act.
